## data about Arrests in the US


## Second data used is about Student Admissions at UC Berkeley - "UCBAdmissions"

we used data from R core datasets to illustrate a variaty of discriptive statistics.
followings are variables of data.

```{r plots}
require(graphics)
apply(UCBAdmissions, c(1,2), sum)
mosaicplot(apply(UCBAdmissions, c(1,2), sum), main = "Student admissions at UC Berkeley")
```
